alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 7:31PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Highlands, eastern Charlotte, southeastern DeSoto and northern Lee Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 731 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Istokpoga to 11 miles northeast of Babcock Ranch to near Babcock Webb Wma to near Pineland. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Lake Placid, Lake Istokpoga, East Dunbar, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Babcock Webb Wma, Pine Island Center, Babcock Ranch, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Olga, Venus, Pineland, Sylvan Shores, St. James City, Buckingham, Burnt Store Marina, and Cornwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; DeSoto; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Lee
